title: Auction Template - Generate free eBay descriptions on the fly
desc: Free and easy to use tool for your eBay listings. The best editor to load your ads, and to create and download responsive descriptions with custom themes.

hero.heading: eBay item descriptions with Auction Template
hero.subheading: Free to use. No Registration. Lightning fast.
hero.paragraph: Use Auction Template to generate your own custom eBay product description within seconds. Secure, free to use and without registration - forever.
